pkgmetadata.longdescription: Identification of Cell Types, Inference of Lineage Trees, and Prediction of Noise Dynamics from Single-Cell RNA-Seq Data // Application of 'RaceID' allows inference of cell types and prediction of lineage trees by the 'StemID2' algorithm (Herman, J.S., Sagar, Grun D. (2018) DOI:10.1038/nmeth.4662). 'VarID2' is part of this package and allows quantification of biological gene expression noise at single-cell resolution (Rosales- Alvarez, R.E., Rettkowski, J., Herman, J.S., Dumbovic, G., Cabezas-Wallscheid, N., Grun, D. (2023) DOI:10.1186/s13059-023-02974-1).
